thread.title: Unitech Europe introduces the new TB120 tablet with integrated numeric keypad and programmable hot keys
thread.title_full: Unitech Europe introduces the new TB120 tablet with integrated numeric keypad and programmable hot keys

author: Retail Technology Review
title: Unitech Europe introduces the new TB120 tablet with integrated numeric keypad and programmable hot keys
text:
The new Unitech TB120 7" Android tablet is claimed to bring a new level of productivity and functionality to the enterprise. The TB120 is said to offer a number of unique features for greater flexibility and durability. Versatile functionality 
Equipped with a built-in physical keypad (with programmable hot keys) makes the TB120 not only user-friendly but also offers for enterprise users a great way to accelerate their workflow indoor and outdoor by supporting a convenient way of data entry. Its durable design makes this rugged tablet the ideal solution for field, logistic and retail applications. 
The Unitech TB120 is built to be functional but it also offers an elegant and durable design. Unitech has been able to drive the TB120 to just 18.8mm thick and 735g heavy / thinner and lighter than any industrial tablet. 
The TB120 also has removable/swappable battery to keep the tablet going longer. It brings a new level of industrial tablet with high reliability for professional usage. With an integrated 1D or 2D scanner, HF-RFID incl. NFC reader/writer and 5 MP auto-focus camera including flash, this tablet is designed to empower your mobile workforce. In addition, the TB120 offers high flexibility and connectivity in the field by supporting the latest Smart Bluetooth 4.0, 802.11 a/b/g/n WLAN and 3.75G WWAN (HSDPA+).
